FuncDef: Thefccommand is used to enter the forwarding class mapping context for the givenfc-name. Each forwarding class maps by default to queues 1 (unicast) and 9 (multipoint).

ParaDef.Info: A valid forwarding class must be specified as fc-name when the fc command is executed. When the fc fc-name command is successfully executed, the system will enter the specified forwarding class context where the queue queue-id command may be executed. Values-be, l2, af, l1, h2, ef, h1, nc.
Required parameter when creating an FC node.
